name: Super Grap AC102ex
description:
Tacky feel.

Launched in 1987, Yonex’s best-selling overgrip — Super Grap — has sold enough grips to wrap around the world five times. It enhances racquet playability by absorbing shock and moisture, giving you outstanding feel and control.

Width: 25 mm
Length: 1,200 mm
Thickness: 0.6 mm
Material: Polyurethane
Quantity: 1 wrap
